item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 9, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Sofie: open-source web based system for automating live TV news production (86 points | 5 comments)
2. Show HN: Aberdeen – An elegant approach to reactive UIs (103 points | 41 comments)
3. ALICE detects the conversion of lead into gold at the LHC (25 points | 3 comments)
4. 21 GB/s CSV Parsing Using SIMD on AMD 9950X (77 points | 19 comments)
5. Show HN: Hyper – Standards first React alternative (28 points | 19 comments)
6. Data manipulations alleged in study that paved way for Microsoft's quantum chip (104 points | 58 comments)
7. Itter.sh – Micro-Blogging via Terminal (29 points | 10 comments)
8. Show HN: Hyvector – A fast and modern SVG editor (128 points | 31 comments)
9. LegoGPT: Generating Physically Stable and Buildable Lego (425 points | 114 comments)
10. Hollow Core Fiber (HCF) (19 points | 10 comments)
11. NSF faces shake-up as officials abolish its 37 divisions (161 points | 169 comments)
12. Implementing a Struct of Arrays (60 points | 19 comments)
13. A Taxonomy for Rendering Engines (9 points | discuss)
14. CryptPad: An Alternative to the Google Suite (21 points | 9 comments)
15. The Linux Kernel's PGP Web of Trust (38 points | 4 comments)
16. Amazon's Vulcan Robots Now Stow Items Faster Than Humans (104 points | 113 comments)
17. Dasung Paperlike 13K is a 13.3 inch E Ink color monitor (30 points | 8 comments)
18. Reconstructing illusory camouflage patterns on moth wings using computer vision (5 points | discuss)
19. Structuring Competency-Based Courses Through Skill Trees (20 points | 9 comments)
20. Entire BART system is down due to computer systems failure (51 points | 9 comments)
21. Zombieverter: Open source VCU for reusing salvage EV components (53 points | 16 comments)
22. Malaya's Timeless Design (48 points | 6 comments)
23. USPTO refuses Tesla Robotaxi trademark as "merely descriptive" (24 points | discuss)
24. Dead Reckoning (135 points | 41 comments)
25. WASM 2.0 (199 points | 90 comments)
26. Starlink User Terminal Teardown (224 points | 74 comments)
27. Audiobookshelf: Self-hosted audiobook and podcast server (149 points | 68 comments)
28. Usenix ATC Announcement (95 points | 9 comments)
29. Fui: C library for interacting with the framebuffer in a TTY context (144 points | 51 comments)
30. Void: Open-source Cursor alternative (833 points | 325 comments)
